channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 3, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-3-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
We've got sessions of great games like *Have A Familiar Ring*, *For This Ungrateful City*, *#iHunt*, and more! Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
Also don't miss out on Gauntlet Community Open Gaming, April 16th through 19th, for a chance for everyone to try out games like these! Get more details [here](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-community-open-gaming.html).
